main event: Multiple reports of UFO sightings in Sumner, New Mexico, including various witnesses describing strange objects in the sky on May 2, 1964.
interesting points: Witnesses reported lights moving at 130 mph at heights around 10,000 feet,There was a hand-drawn sketch attached that depicted the lights seen during the sightings,Several witnesses described the same lights with distinctive features such as no sound and formation flying,The Air Force investigation treated reports seriously and requested further details from witnesses,The sightings were unexplainable according to the conclusion provided in the reports.
witnesses: Multiple residents including a notable mention of Douglass DeCicco
